strapiJob.title: Store Co-Manager
strapiJob.description:
This is a fast paced Manager position in a fun Boutique/Gift store that has been in business 30+ years. Experience is a plus, maturity, honesty, high energy, out going personality, great in sales are all mandatory!

Hiring for Co-Manager to work with our other Manager. Responsibilities are hiring and managing all sales help, overseeing all areas of the store, including inventory, social media, photography, and visuals etc. This is a job that requires a high energy person that can multi task, and is very organized. You should be very strong in sales, and sales techniques in order to train all new hires. Being outgoing is imperative. Work in a fun environment with great talent, and positive attitudes!
